com.google.calendar.interoperability.connectorplugin.base.messages.util
Class NovellDate

java.lang.Object
  com.google.calendar.interoperability.connectorplugin.base.messages.util.NovellDate

public class NovellDate
extends Object

Date object as defined by novell Docs from novel: 25/5/94 11:05 +11:00 A four-digit year is optional, such as 1994. If you use a two-digit year, the range 70-99 assumes 1970-1999, while years in the 00-69 range assume 2000-2069. DD/MM/YY[YY] HH:MM[:SS] [+/-HH[:MM]] where items in square brackets, such as [:SS], indicate optional elements. If you use GMT offset, notice that a space must be inserted in front of the +/- sign. Single digits are accepted in all fields, as in 25/5/94.
